span.style: font-family: 'arial black', 'avant garde'; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;

p.span: Dewey Schools is offering a FREE meal program for children age 2 - 18 while school is closed due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

li.span: A breakfast and lunch meal can be picked up Monday-Friday from 11:00am - 12:30pm.

Because these are federally approved reimbursable meals for the school, there can only be 1 breakfast and lunch meal provided daily per child between the ages of 2-18. This means children must be present, either by walking up or in a vehicle, to be eligible for a meal. We are required to conduct counts on meals distributed.
The Meals can be picked up using the drive through option at the Dewey Public School Cafeteria location or at any of the three bus stop locations and times listed above.

span.strong: We really want to encourage everyone who needs meal service during this closure to participate in this program so that we may continue to offer it until school is back in session.

p.span: Pre-K Enrollment is Postposed until further notice
here on Dewey Schools website & Facebook page
